attributes.action: Keep the share of UK banks recently purchased.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the govenment has come to the aid of UK banks due to the gobal credit crisis with public funds, that the share should be kept as part nationalisation of the industry. UK banks have made exremely heathy profits in the past and paid some individuals big bonuses of the back of the profit. The aim is simple keep the share of the banking sector and let the banks run themselves but have say in bonuses paid and let the UK taxpayer share in the good times as well as the bad.

This wuld be for example 40% of the UK banking profit year on year paid to back into the UK ecomony.
